text: Ata'eba tomara tara kache ya'o ebam balah amara ubhaye'i tomara palanakartara prerita rasula, ata'eba amadera sathe bani isara'ilake yete da'o ebam taderake nipirana karo na. Amara tomara palanakartara kacha theke nidarsana niye tomara kache agamana karechi. Ebam ye satpatha anusarana kare, tara prati santi.
